description: Trevenant (オーロット) is a tree-like Pokémon possessing multiple root-like legs and one eye that was first briefly featured in a commercial for Pokémon X and Y shown at screenings of ExtremeSpeed Genesect: Mewtwo Awakens in Japan, which was later shown on the eShop and uploaded to Pokémon Japan`s official YouTube channel.
name: Oarot
